main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.block

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.block.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents one block in the block chain. The block holds a 36-bytes array and all operations are performed directly on this array.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Block.BlockError

      • createNoSig

        public static Block createNoSig(int serialNumber,
                                int walletNumber,
                                byte[] prevSig8)
        Creates a block without a signature or puzzle fields.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - The block's serial number
        walletNumber - Wallet number of the group
        prevSig8 - last 8 bytes of the signature of the previous block.
        Returns:
        new block with the according parameters

      • create

        public static Block create(int serialNumber,
                           int walletNumber,
                           byte[] prevSig8,
                           byte[] puzzle8,
                           byte[] sig12)
        Creates the according block from all the fields.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - The block's serial number.
        walletNumber - Wallet number of the group.
        prevSig8 - Last 8 bytes of the signature of the previous block.
        puzzle8 - the puzzle for this block.
        sig12 - Last 12 bytes of this block's signature.
        Returns:
        A new block according to the parameters.
